summary: The script assembles a tarred dataset for a spellchecking ASR customization model, reading a Hydra configuration (default or user‑specified) and command‑line overrides to locate the processed TSV data, language model, and label map, then packages the selected records into a tar file for efficient training.
business_intent: Enable fast and reproducible preparation of training data for a customized speech‑recognition spellchecking model, allowing downstream training pipelines to consume a compact, streamable tar archive.
